 How the Bermuda Triangle Works 
You won't
find it on any official map and you won't know when you cross the line, but
according to some people, the Bermuda Triangle is a very real place where dozen
of ships, planes and people have disappeared with no good explanation. Discover
the mystery behind the controversy and learn about some disappearances in the
Triangle that still defy explanation.
Also at HowStuffWorks
 
How
Liquid Body Armor Works - Modern body armor slows down weapons and
diffuses the energy from their impact. But just like ancient suits of armor,
today's body armor can be heavy and inflexible. Learn how liquid body armor can
turn flexible fabric into bulletproof armor instantaneously.   


How
Earthquakes Work - An
earthquake is one of the most terrifying phenomena that nature can dish up.
Scientists understand to some extent what causes earthquakes, but there's still
a lot of mystery surrounding them. Find out how earthquakes work, what the
Richter Scale is and how scientists and builders deal with earthquakes.
 


How MREs
Work - Militaries
around the world rely on small, carefully engineered packages of food called
MREs to feed their soldiers. Learn about the surprisingly sophisticated design
of these portable meals.
   
This Week's Video 


How Air
Conditioners Work - Air
conditioners can be an essential tool in staving off the summer heat. If used
and maintained properly, they can also be affordable and energy efficient. In
this video from HowStuffWorks, find out how air conditioners work.
